short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some extra features to Twitter, including video download, picture-in-picture, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introduces additional features and abilities to your Twitter experience. For example, easier saving of media (such as GIFs and Videos), as well as support for Picture-in-Picture (video pop-outs). Other options available in Options (click the â˜° icon next to the extension, select Options from list) include the ability to hide "Who to Follow" and "What's Happening" sidebar items, wrap tick-escaped inline code with <code> tags, make voice tweets downloadable, and convert video timestamps to clickable links.
